0.text: Bug 14368  Create getter and setter insert code into read-only file.

2.text: Create a class C as follow:  package jp1;  public class C { 	private int id; }  2.

3.text: Close it and mark it as read only 3.

4.text: Reopen it and you should not be able to modify anything 4.

5.text: From the outline view, select "id - int" and right mouse click and  select "Create getter and setter".

7.text: The class becomes  package jp1;  public class C { 	private int id; 	/** 	 * Gets the id.

8.text: * @return Returns a int 	 */ 	public int getId() { 		return id; 	}  	/** 	 * Sets the id.

9.text: * @param id The id to set 	 */ 	public void setId(int id) { 		this.id = id; 	}  }     and the editor is dirty, but you cannot save it until clear the read-only  flag.
